Name: Tactical Monsters - Strategy Edition
About the game: Tactical Monsters Strategy Edition is a special version of Tactical Monsters. Based on the connect6 rules for monsters deployment on the field and fight turns order, brings a fresh new playstyle concept which comes very close to a game of chess with the addition of strategic passive skills.
